News Flash! Effect of Dino Tail discovered.
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): FAQ: The Most Important Game Data: News Flash! Effect of Dino Tail discovered.
By Dark Phoenix on Thursday, July 12, 2001 - 11:35 pm:

Well, it's DP here again. Thanks to a lead I got from a Japanese Monster Farm site, I was finally able to discern the effect of the Dino Tail. If you want to find out what it does, read on, and prepare for a BIG disappointment.

During my testing, I found that the Dino Tail relieves Fatigue in much the same manner as an Artemis Statue. That is, it reduces fatigue at the beginning of each month according to the monsters current fatigue. Here's how much Fatigue the Dino Tail reduces.

0 - 99 Fatigue: No effect
100 Fatigue: -1 Fatigue

Whoopee :/
